Title: Get Me Roger Stone
Director: Dylan Bank, Daniel DiMauro, Morgan Pehme
Writer: Dylan Bank, Daniel DiMauro, Morgan Pehme
Actors: Roger Stone, Donald Trump, Paul Manafort, Jeffrey Toobin
Plot: A documentary exploring the life and career of notorious Republican dirty trickster and longtime Trump adviser, Roger Stone, who helped create the real estate mogul's political career.
